entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pickering

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
